gnat.database.go
Class GOAccess

java.lang.Object
  gnat.database.go.GOAccess

public class GOAccess
extends java.lang.Object

Handles the connection to the Gene Ontology database. Provides some standard queries.

Author:
Joerg Hakenberg

                             java.lang.String acc2)

Parameters:
acc1 -

getDistance

public float getDistance(java.lang.String acc1,
                         java.lang.String acc2)
Calculates the distance of two GO terms (IDs). Formula:
                            min.pathlen (g1, g2)
 dist(g1,g2) = --------------------------------------------
                 max.depth(g1, g2) + min.pathlen (g1, g2)

Parameters:
acc1 -
acc2 -
Returns:

getGOAccMinimalDepth

public int getGOAccMinimalDepth(java.lang.String acc)
Gets the minimal depth of a GO term (given by an accession number).

Parameters:
acc -
Returns:
minimal distance to ROOT ("all"

getGOTermForAcc

public java.lang.String getGOTermForAcc(java.lang.String acc)
Returns the first GO term that corresponds to the given accession number. Accession numbers start with "GO:" and then are followed by seven digits: "GO:0016563". In case acc does not fit this scheme, but is a number nevertheless, adds "GO:" and the necessary amount of zeros.

Parameters:
acc -
Returns:

getGOTermsForAcc

public java.lang.String[] getGOTermsForAcc(java.lang.String acc)
Returns all GO term that correspond to the given accession number. Accession numbers start with "GO:" and then are followed by seven digits: "GO:0016563". In case acc does not fit this scheme, but is a number nevertheless, adds "GO:" and the necessary amount of zeros.

Parameters:
acc -
Returns:

getParentsForGOAccessionNumber

Gets any parent GO acccession numbers for this accession number.

getParentsForGOAccessionNumber

public java.lang.String[] getParentsForGOAccessionNumber(java.lang.String acc,
                                                         int distance)
Gets any parent GO acccession numbers for this accession number having exactly the specified distance.

Parameters:
acc -
distance -
Returns:

isGOAccessionNumber

public static boolean isGOAccessionNumber(java.lang.String acc)
Checks whether the given string number is a valid GO accession number: "GO:" followed by seven digits. Does not check if this number actually appears in the current version of GO!

Parameters:
acc - - the String to test
Returns:
true if acc is a valid GO accession number

isOpen

public boolean isOpen()
Checks if an open connection to the DB exists. If not, call open() to open a connection.

Returns:

makeGOAccessionNumber

public static java.lang.String makeGOAccessionNumber(int number)
Transforms the given number into a GO accession number. Adds "GO:" and the necessary number of zeros, until the number has seven digits.
Returns "GO:0000000" if the number initially had more than seven digits already.

Parameters:
number -
Returns:

makeGOAccessionNumber

public static java.lang.String makeGOAccessionNumber(java.lang.String number)
Transforms the given number into a GO accession number. Adds "GO:" and the necessary number of zeros, until the number has seven digits.
Returns "GO:0000000" if number initially had more than seven digits already, or if the number was not a number at all.

Parameters:
number -
Returns:

open

public boolean open(java.lang.String driver,
                    java.lang.String url,
                    java.lang.String user,
                    java.lang.String pass)
Opens a connection to the database. If a connection is already open, closes this connection first and then opens a new one.

Returns:

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
For testing purposes only.

Parameters:
args -
